text:
@realDonaldTrump Yes, it is certainly Obama's fault that you are playing golf while thousands of people are getting sick and dying from COVID-19 because of your arrogance, ignorance and incompetence in the handling of the pandemic.  You will not be re-elected!

End the Nightmare!  Biden 2020!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
